body:
Hey guys, back again with another spotlight. I will now be doing Spotlights whenever I want instead of on a fixed schedule. If you want one of your own, fill out the application format here: https://goo.gl/forms/f9XjcBVJ5vMl72bZ2 Today's spotlightee is Lasuz!

What is your username in Minecraft and what is your favourite game on Avicus?
My name is Lasuz, and my favourite game mode is Capture The Wool

Introduce yourself in 3-4 sentences.
My real name is Lasuz, but my irl name is Lars. I joined Avicus about 3 years ago, but I had a big brake for like 1 and an half year. You might remember me as "hgf12" (yes, I know it's a bad name). I'm currently playing for jalapenos, and I love the competitive scene on avicus!

​What are you the most excited/obsessed over at the moment?
I'm obsessed with uhhhhhh agar.io xD. I enjoy the game, and me and my friends have a lot of fun together on it! :)

What interests you the most in life?
In my life right now, I'm most interested in the sport called "orienteering" . I have been into it for a while, but I just started to REALLY like it. I feel I'm decent at it, but the best thing is that I get to know new people from all around the country :).

​What music/art/media do you like?
Lately i've been getting really into remixes. I love the ones kygo make! Mozart is always on when I study tho ;) .

​Where are you from?
Norway

​What do you spend most of your time doing while on Avicus?​
I play scrims or in public. When there's no mods online, I like to spectate the other's.

​Anything else you want to mention?
#TargetCammy

title: Community Spotlight #19 - Lasuz
